definition: currently in short supply/in deficit (of commodity)/currently vacant (position)

sentences.english: Credit cards enable us to buy something we need when we are temporarily short of money.
sentences.chinese: 手頭暫缺現金時，信用卡可讓我們購買想要的東西。

sentences.english: Now there is no auto battery cell production enterprise in this region.
sentences.chinese: 目前區內暫缺汽車電瓶生產企業。
